title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added OIDC authentication support for Dependabot to access private registries (AWS CodeArtifact, Azure DevOps Artifacts, JFrog Artifactory), replacing static credentials with dynamic tokens.
Restructured Copilot Metrics documentation into a dedicated section with a new landing page and updated content organization.
Simplified Advanced Security licensing documentation by replacing detailed requirements with a prerequisites section and clearer billing references.
Updated registry configuration examples and reference tables to include OIDC parameters (`tenant-id`, `client-id`) across multiple package managers.

- Updated registry configuration examples and reference tables to include OIDC parameters (`tenant-id`, `client-id`) across multiple package managers.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added OIDC authentication support for Dependabot to access private registries (AWS CodeArtifact, Azure DevOps Artifacts, JFrog Artifactory), replacing static credentials with dynamic tokens.
- Restructured Copilot Metrics documentation into a dedicated section with a new landing page and updated content organization.
- Simplified Advanced Security licensing documentation by replacing detailed requirements with a prerequisites section and clearer billing references.
- Updated registry configuration examples and reference tables to include OIDC parameters (`tenant-id`, `client-id`) across multiple package managers.

### Title  
Add OIDC for Dependabot, restructure Copilot Metrics, and simplify Advanced Security docs
